episodes.title: Heated exchanges during Bondi's Epstein files testimony
episodes.description:
Attorney General Pam Bondi testified before the House Judiciary Committee on Wednesday as the Justice Department faces questions over its handling of the Jeffrey Epstein files. Watch some of the most notable moments.

#news #politics #epsteinfiles 

0:00 Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) makes opening statement
8:01 Rep. Jamie Raskin (D-MD) makes opening statement
19:22 Bondi's opening statement
27:53 Rep. Pramila Jayapal (D-WA) blasts Bondi as Epstein survivors watch
33:48 Bondi and Rep. Jerry Nadler (D-NY) get into heated exchange over co-conspirators question
43:44 Bondi tells Rep. Zoe Lofgren (D-CA) DOJ will "investigate any case involving any victim"
50:21 Jordan asks Bondi about Don Lemon probe, potential investigation into former CIA director
55:27 Bondi tells Rep. Hank Johnson (D-GA) "your time is up" when asked if she would apologize to survivors
1:00:45 Rep. Ted Lieu (D-CA) accuses Bondi of lying under oath on Epstein files surrounding Trump
1:06:10 Bondi: DOJ "will of course unredact" mens' names that "should not have been" hidden
1:11:20 Rep. Thomas Massie (R-KY) confronts Bondi about redactions
1:18:13 Rep. Becca Balint (D-VT) and Bondi get into shouting match
1:24:17 Rep. Chip Roy (R-TX) asks Bondi why some survivors' names were unredacted
1:29:46 CBS News congressional correspondent Nicole Killion reports

episodes.title: Ghislaine Maxwell attorney says she'll testify about Epstein in exchange for clemency
episodes.description:
Ghislaine Maxwell, a longtime associate of convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, invoked the Fifth Amendment and refused to answer questions during a virtual appearance before the House Oversight and Government Reform Committee on Monday. Her lawyer, though, said she would be willing to cooperate if President Trump grants her clemency. CBS News justice reporter Jake Rosen has more.

episodes.title: U.K. Prime Minister Keir Starmer faces political fallout from Epstein files
episodes.description:

#keirstarmer #epsteinfiles #news

episodes.description:

episodes.title: What led to ex-Abercrombie CEO Mike Jeffries' sex trafficking charges?
episodes.description:
The former CEO of clothing retailer Abercrombie & Fitch has been arrested on federal sex trafficking and interstate prostitution charges. Mike Jeffries, his partner and a third associate are accused of recruiting young men under the guise of modeling opportunities and coercing them to perform sex acts. BBC News investigations correspondent Rianna Croxford breaks down the case.

episodes.title: Cults
episodes.description: Title from data sheetOriginally broadcast on the CBS television program entitled: 60 minutesIntended audience: Ages 14 through adultsIssued also as videorecordingA documentary on religious cult groups. Features an unidentified twenty-six-year-old member of a cult and his parents, who present opposing perceptions of these groups. Includes remarks by Catholic and Jewish clergymen, and focuses on the issues of deception and mind control by the cults during a meeting of ex-members and their families
